Row.Text: Allows your Workers to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Jungle[ENDCOLOR], clearing the map tile so other improvements can be constructed. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spearman[ENDCOLOR], a military unit strong against mounted enemies.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows your Workers to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Jungle[ENDCOLOR], clearing the map tile so other improvements can be constructed. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spearman[ENDCOLOR], a military unit strong against mounted enemies.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows your Workers to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Jungle[ENDCOLOR], clearing the map tile so other improvements can be constructed. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spearman[ENDCOLOR], a military unit strong against mounted enemies.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows your Workers to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Jungle[ENDCOLOR], clearing the map tile so other improvements can be constructed. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spearman[ENDCOLOR], a military unit strong against mounted enemies.

Reveals [ICON_RES_IRON] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Iron[ENDCOLOR]. Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mines[ENDCOLOR] to increase the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of map tiles, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Forests[ENDCOLOR], allowing the construction of other improvements.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Reveals [ICON_RES_IRON] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Iron[ENDCOLOR]. Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mines[ENDCOLOR] to increase the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of map tiles, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Forests[ENDCOLOR], allowing the construction of other improvements.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Reveals [ICON_RES_IRON] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Iron[ENDCOLOR]. Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mines[ENDCOLOR] to increase the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of map tiles, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Forests[ENDCOLOR], allowing the construction of other improvements.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Reveals [ICON_RES_IRON] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Iron[ENDCOLOR]. Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mines[ENDCOLOR] to increase the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of map tiles, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Forests[ENDCOLOR], allowing the construction of other improvements.
